title: Logo ID (St.Regis hotel logo)
content:
[http://www.condotelfinancing.com/projects/StRegis-Logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503172025/http:/www.condotelfinancing.com/projects/StRegis-Logo.jpg "http://www.condotelfinancing.com/projects/StRegis-Logo.jpg")

Anyone know who designed the St.Regis hotel logo? Just want to know who I should thank for being so awesome.

Also, I wish there was a Typophile for logos where I can post questions like this.
author: superkhy

comments.content: Google is your friend! It says [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503172025/http:/www.gdusa.com/issue_2008/01_jan/feature/p32.php) Ken Schwartz currently leads the graphic design department at the The Luxury Brands Group, consisting of — amongst others — St. Regis Hotels and Resorts. Not sure if he did the logo, though. You might wanna drop him an e-mail.
